website_summaries.verdict: A top pick for a motorized tie rack, this version is ideal for men with a large tie collection.
pros: Customers appreciate that this is easy to install and lightweight
Provides streamlined access to many ties
It also stands out for operating quickly and quietly
cons: Instructions tend to be difficult to understand
May not work with all closet rods

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and easy to install....
customer_reviews.text: This is my second motorized tie rack. Had to buy it because I own way too many ties. The first one I bought was another brand and still works but has always been slow. I've got 72 ties on this rack and it runs like it has none on it, runs fast and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Sheer Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Light is bright, doesn't stay on too long. It moves quickly, but not so fast you have to back up (if you're paying attention)... that said, have your finger on the stop button and pay attention. Oh, and it looks sweet too! Bottom line: if you really need a tie rack, or you just like cool gadgets that are actually useful - get it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy set up, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought and set up this Primode Tie Rack in December 2017. It was an easy set up and it has worked well since then without any problem. This is much better than my previous one from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for one of our son's and he absolutely loves it. The mounting was easy and could be done various ways based on the closet application. The light is a big plus to ensure you get the right tie when your getting ready in the morning. He is now looking forward to getting more ties and belts with the additional room he has for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Yauk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the BEST tie rack I’ve ever owned. I’ve had 3 from sharper image and paid $79 or more each time but they last about 3 years and then the clips that hold it on the rack snap. This one literally slides on the whole bar about 6 inches. No screws needed PERIOD! It’s super balanced and held on tight. I love it. Yes it can be fast but you get used to that cuz to be honest the sharper image one was to slow and I’m using the same batteries. So once again 5 stars!!!!!! Oh and it absolutely works great on a wood rod. I’ll twke a photo. Works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: Negative sounding positive review
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and attached securely to my wood closet rod. The buttons don't work very intuitively. Letting off should stop it and the light remain on. As it is you have to press power to stop it but the light does remain on for a time. It spins quite fast. I pass my ties or go back a lot which makes the buttons a bit more fruatrating. 1/2 speed would be nice. Belts stored where suggested cause ties to catch as they go by. Sounds like a negative review now that I write it but I do like it. Get 4 C batteries as it does not come with any.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: A great product and a great investment !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tie Rack. I'm able to organize my Ties by color and it's just a cool little device. I really like that it has a light and an auto-stop feature. I hooked it to the steel shelving in my closet without any issues and it's very steady. It doesn't sway or rock at all. My wife thinks I should get another one, because I'm always buying Ties. 83 and counting.
customer_reviews.author: TyBlack

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend had been struggling to find a way to store his growing collection of ties, I surprised him with this for Christmas/a move in gift. He LOVES it! The initial process of getting it set up was a little bit of a hassle and the biggest complaint is making sure it doesn’t tilt he manages to keep it up right as only half is full but the day he manages to fill it up I’m worried he’ll have to deal with it constantly being tilted which is more an annoyance than anything but doesn’t take up too much space and he’s now able to see all his ties and doesn’t end up wearing the same five every week like before.
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have about 60 bow ties and used several tie racks and the ties were all over the place. This device really does a nice job of organizing them. Of course I can't speak to durability after only a week but it seems well built and easily fit on my clothes rod. The only downside is I lose about 5 or 6 inches of space to hang shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Speedy
customer_reviews.text: This tie rack is perfect. My husband has quite the tie collection so this provided enough spaces to handle all of his ties while leaving enough slots to add more. We like how quiet it is too as we sort through the ties. And it rotates quickly which is a plus. This is a replacement from a much older model. It is nice to see how it has improved over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: At first this tie rack seemed to be a good buy. I really liked the idea of being ...
customer_reviews.text: At first this tie rack seemed to be a good buy. I really liked the idea of being able to replace the batteries without having to get on top of it, but rather just slide out the battery compartment. However, I have it now for little more than 7 months and it just quit working. No idea if there is any kind of warranty for it. Didn't even last as long as the other ones I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Hou_Schatz

customer_reviews.title: "Dress for Success" and get organized with the Primode Motorized Tie Rack with LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my husband's growing collection of ties! The motorized tie rack holds many, many ties and we were able to color coordinate the rack so that the color selection process during those early morning hours is easier. The tie rack takes up a small amount of space yet can hold many ties. My husband's favorite feature is the light that can assist in easily identifying tie colors. GQ models we're not but the Primode Motorized Tie Rack with LED Lights sure helps one "dress for success" during those morning hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TIE ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these to replace old ones, different brand, that no longer worked. I found the directions in the booklet difficult at times and ended up with about seven different screws, etc. per rack that don't seem to belong to this purchase. It isn't too hard to hang onto closet rods and it does operate as it should. Since my husband has used similar tie racks we know what to expect. I only hope this product has a long closet life because past purchases did not. It is the only way to go if you have lots of ties; everything is in order and easy to locate. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my closet. Finally, organized and accessible ties. The light is cool- though not necessary in my well lit closet. Seems pretty stable and durable. We'll see how it hold us.
customer_reviews.author: lake city lady

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working after 2 weeks.  Light comes on but no action at all
customer_reviews.text: Initially liked the product but after a few days it won't move. Light comes on but no way to rotate ties. What do I do david morris. 10/22/2018 I have not received a response to my review of 10/22/2018. What should I do next to get advice or a replacement? David Morris
customer_reviews.author: David R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: My New Necklace Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This item works well as a necklace organizer. It is easy to attach to a wooden closet rod. It holds a lot of necklaces. I have mine spread out with at least one empty spot between each of them. The only problem is that it spins too quickly and the necklaces swing outward. I have to keep the hangers next to the tie rack far enough away so the necklaces don't catch on them as they are passing by.
customer_reviews.author: Groucho

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation on bars, fast!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I hardly saw in other reviews or in the product description is how exactly the product is installed on a bar. Well, the product simply comes off into two pieces, you attach the two pieces together over and under the closet bar, and insert a couple screws and that's it! Took me only a few minutes to install it. What I like the most about the unit is that (1) it has a light so you can clearly see the ties and (2) it's FAST! Other units I've had are sluggish but this one is excellent. Sturdy as well, looks good, and doesn't take much closet space. Overall I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Everything a Motorized Tie Rack Should Be
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of ties and recently purchased my second Primode Motorized Tie rack to accommodate all of my ties. My first one is still working great. I've owned a lot of motorized tie racks over the years and this is by far the best one for the price. It's FAST and can hold a lot of ties. Other tie racks I have owned either have low capacity or move really slow. It has an LED light and is very easy to install and holds steady on the closet rod. It also has hooks under the tie rack that you can hang belts from. I highly recommend this tie rack! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works smoothly and quietly
customer_reviews.text: My husband had too many ties for the tie holder we had. This motorized unit holds all of his ties with room for many more! It holds the ties securely and they don't even fall off when the unit is operating - it runs very smoothly! The unit is primarily designed for pole-type closet bars but it does have hanging wires so that you can hang it on wire-rack type shelving (which we have). It's not as easy to hang this on wire-rack shelving as it would be on pole-type rods. It can certainly be done but it was a bit of a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Northerngirl

customer_reviews.title: Battery Powered Tie Rack
customer_reviews.text: I had been using an old plastic clip type tie rack for many years. As that rack got older the plastic clips became brittle and I was down to just a few and had to hang my ties on a hanger (which works, but makes it hard to get ties off). This Battery Powered Tie Rack solves those issues and now allows me to easily see all my ties in seconds, as they spin around. When you install this, be sure to give yourself enough room on the sides, as the ties fly out a bit and can tangle with clothes that hang to the sides. This was a welcome replacement to my antiquated tie rack.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Broken strait out of box
customer_reviews.text: Good design and easy to install (reason for two stars). I am confident the item I got is defective the spin function only works clockwise. The bottom for counter clockwise does not work. I put all my ties before put in the battery, will likely return it and buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: rouzbeh shams

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tie rack for my husband. It seemed well-made and we were able to install it with only a few challenges. However, within a month of use it stopped working. Pushing the buttons to rotate the tie rack illuminates the light, but there is no movement or apparent attempts at movement. Changing the batteries didn’t help. Very disappointed to have invested in something that wasn’t made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee R.

customer_reviews.title: Every Man’s Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé for Fathers Day - WINNER gift!! He had so many ties on four hangers which of course kept sliding off. This is a great gift as it held all his ties with room for more in a neat and orderly fashion. Easy to install - you’ll need 4 C batteries. The LED light is bright and the rotating feather goes either forward or reverse which is nice. Highly recommend for anyone with ties.
customer_reviews.author: 🌞 SunShine 808

customer_reviews.title: Great tie rack! But....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tie rack for my Husbands ties! Unfortunately, no fault of the manufacturer of course, the rod in our closet is a bit small so it does not completely hold the rack in place. I used the hooks provided, tightened the tie rack as securely as I could and then I had to wedge a piece of styrofoam in between the top of the rack and the shelf for the tie rack to completely be sturdy & level. My hope is to get a thicker rod one day and hopefully I won’t have to rig it the way I did for it to be sturdy, but for now it’s working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O

customer_reviews.title: This thing organizes most of my ties in a useable fashion
customer_reviews.text: This thing is kinda neat. I have a lot of ties, and this gadget organizes and displays about 80 of them. The electric rotary track is useful for selecting a tie to wear. It takes up a fair amount of room on my closet bar, when you consider clothing needs to hang away from it to give the track room to rotate, but it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Island Boy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed and wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: This motorized tie rack works very smoothly and well. Installation was pretty straight forward. My closet set up required me to hang it using the hooks provided with the rack. With the ability to hang up to 72 ties and several belts, this has made finding and storing my ties so much easier. Thank you for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Harkavy

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: It will certainly become an excellent addition to your household. My dad says it's really easy to install, and it has a lot of storage space. The light is pretty useful, bright and turns off after 10 seconds. I love the fact it doesn't take up too much space in the closet due to its design. 10/10, it's modern and pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works OK.
customer_reviews.text: Needed holder for my ties after we removed peg board that I was using. I installed this on a Rubbermaid rod. The problem is that the rod is not fixed and will rotate. A minor problem. But, you should know about it. A few ties will shift the balance point from in front of the attachment point to behind the attachment point.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried this would wobble back and forth on the bar, but it hangs nicely. I CAN move it back and forth, but if I'm just using it the way its supposed to be used, it does just fine. I have it about half full, and the motor works just fine. The little light up front is nice, and I guess it would be valuable in a dimly lit closet, but my closet is bright enough that it doesn't need the light. Before I ordered this, my ties were piled on top of each other on a wall hangar; now I have them arranged by color and shade, and it doesn't take up that much space!
customer_reviews.author: Virgil C Jones

customer_reviews.title: Shows off the ties and enables to take one without dropping any.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks and the ease of usage. No more falling off ties all over the place! The instructions could have been better and the fastner packaging was crude. It took a little while to install onto the wire closet shelf. Wish the long install screws were just a little longer - would have made install way easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hilke L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but only buy the "Promise" version not others!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great time rack. I like the tighten screw that is featured on the bottom, however don't overtighten otherwise you'll end up cracking the plastic grips. I reinforced the sides with tape, to ensure less tension on the middle screw. I would recommend this product, but be aware that this is the same rack as the other brands. They're all sold by Promise, but with other names.
customer_reviews.author: NiKO

customer_reviews.title: A NICE TIE RACK FOR SOME MEN
customer_reviews.text: My ONLY complaint deals with trying to install the unit on wire shelving. The braces on the shelving are too close together to have room for the tie rack. Try as I might, I couldn't connect the rack to the shelving. Too bad, because I really wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: LAFAYETTE

customer_reviews.title: Potentially good device. It took a while to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Potentially good device. It took a while to figure out how to install it. When I was finally able to install it, there was a balancing issue. The machine kept spinning on the rod until being stopped by the rack above. It seems to require no ties or to be filled completely with ties to prevent the machine from spinning on the rod. Any recommendations regarding balancing the machine permanently would be greatly appreciated. The distance between machine and rack is about 2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing is confusing as hell. It took me several hours to figure out how to get the batteries into it. The instructions it comes with are ridiculously ambiguous. I nearly destroyed the thing trying to pry it apart and put the batteries in. But, once out together, it works well enough. You know what they say: you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Lorance

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but the rotation is a little quick
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for a Christmas gift and it was received well. Had it installed for a few weeks. Works well for keeping all of the ties. Only downside is that it rotates in only one speed which is a little fast. definitely recommend though to keep the ties organized.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For The Guy With Lots of Ties
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loved it. Thankfully he gave away a lot of ties or else some wouldn’t have fit. It lights inside his closet making it easier to choose. The rotation is not completely silent but not loud enough to be an issue. I was worried...but no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: functional but poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This tie rack functions as it should to hold a whole lot of ties. That said, it only has one point in the middle that holds it in place on the closet rod. Therefore, it's somewhat unstable and hangs out of balance. Because the front is weighted down with the four C batteries, it keels towards the front. Before I installed the batteries, the back was heavier and it leaned towards the back. It really should have two pressure points instead of just one, so it would stay parallel to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: If you use the hooks it leans forward because of batteries in front
customer_reviews.text: This is for Miriam. I don’t write reviews but since you took the time to reach out I’d love to help. Having to be suited up everyday I have an abundance of ties so the overall product and usefulness is great. That being said, I have an issue with using the hooks. Due to the batteries being in the front, there is an uneven weight distribution so the rack leans forward which doesn’t allow it to be even and toes stay on in the back. Fix this and you have a 5/5....ateast for me
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tie rack
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool item and works beautifully. You do have to have a completely open space above the clothing bar and the bar has to be clean without any plastic covers in order for this to fit properly. I removed the cover, slipped it on, filled it up completely with ties and it is amazing. The belt hooks on the inside are nice, but when it is filled with ties, it is not easy to get to a belt in the center. Still love this item. Well made, nice design, lights and left and right control.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Enclosures

customer_reviews.title: Everything it was advertised to be!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, and after looking at the design, it's easy to change the batteries after installation. At first I thought it rotated too fast, but once you load it up with ties, it moves at the perfect speed to see the ties and not feel like you have to wait forever for the one you want. The light is large enough and bright enough to see in my very dark closet. It's almost completely silent as it moves with ease. It takes up very little room to store 50 ties!! After going through many manual tie racks, I would absolutely recommend this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: great tie rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my husband who has approximately 70 ties.....he loves it.....it looks really well and looks "smart" in his closet.....my only issue is that we had to google the product in order to find out where the batteries were located, because there wasn't any paperwork included in the box. But that is really my only issue.....other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for a while and when it went on special I purchased it and WOW! It is super easy to install and has so much storage space, Ive had it for a month now and it still hasn't run out of battery life, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: A must for closet organization
customer_reviews.text: I wear a suit and tie regularly and own several ties. This machine is amazing. This is the second tie rack I have owned of its kind and the technology between the two has improved significantly. The LED light is a great added feature and the product is very easy to install. I would highly recommend this to anyone who owns many ties.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Pace

customer_reviews.title: It’s not just for ties!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the intention of using it for all of my necklaces to hang on in the closet instead if my husbands ties! It absolutely helped me to organize my jewelry with easy access to my necklaces instead of them being thrown in a draw. The best organizer ever!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Look at my ties!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tie rack that lights up when it is on. It's easy to stop and start! Best of all the ties hang neatly and so they are not wrinkled or scrunched to tightly. We have filled all 72 allowed spots! My husband really likes this and loves the light at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Littlev

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Using this device exclusively for ties and it is great. Easy to assemble. Easy to mount and is very sturdy on a metal rod. Moves really fast when viewing your ties, but the light is bright and once you get used to the buttons it's really easy. You can scan through all your ties quickly for sure! Can't comment on the durability (long term) as I've used it less than two weeks - but I suspect that if one is careful with the tie mounts they should last. Don't get the sense they would be great for belts though. Overall very happy at the short term followup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Wish is spun faster
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product and has been working well for a few months now. My only complaint is when it is fully loaded with ties, it spins really slowly. It still spins, just a lot slower. Not a deal breaker though and if I needed another one (I already have 2) I wouldn't hesitate to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: It came fast plus the packaging was well done it has some small parts that can damage during delivery process but it was well secured thanks . It is working so far so will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ava- wv.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts/ Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Missing the bolt that tightens the unit to my closet pole. Also missing the belt hooks that attach to the bottom of the unit. Disappointing. We’ll see what customer service can do to help. Update: Miriam in Customer Service was quick to send out the missing parts. I truly appreciate the quick action. Husband has been using this for about two weeks now and is very happy with its functionality. So nice to have ties and belts neat and organized. Great product from a customer friendly business.
customer_reviews.author: McHale

customer_reviews.title: Just one complaint.
customer_reviews.text: This product had been a big help in organizing my neckties but I do have one complaint. The motor moves the ties too fast! I'd like to see a speed selector switch so I could slow the rotation down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Branch

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good but Lacks Quality
customer_reviews.text: It works and doe have a lot of hooks for ties but the overall functionality is not that great. The rack rotates too fast and the stopping function is the off button which requires getting used to. weight must be evenly distributed or the rack will tilt when rotating.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Millwee

customer_reviews.title: Tie Rack Solution!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tie rack I have ever owned. So many of them are off balance, cheap, or break. This is great and fast. Just an excellent product! This is the last tie rack you will need!!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Steady Flow and No Sound?  NO SOUND!!! For real!  Just a small HUmmmmmmmMmMmmM
customer_reviews.text: Very Stirdy, Flows very nice, LOW SOUND if any! great light and Enough Room for ALL my ties.. wich is ALOT! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NerdsPalace

customer_reviews.title: Great Tie Rack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tie rack. It was easy to install. I got it to replace my old motorized tie rack. This is much better quality; it has more tie holders; it moves well in both directions. You can buy this with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Darbonne

customer_reviews.title: One of best purchases
customer_reviews.text: This time rack seemed a bit too good to be true. I was looking for a simple rack to replace my 2 wall mounted racks that had broken. I thought I’d give it a try after reading several reviews. I was thinking, if it’s too complicated to assemble I’ll just return it. Low and behold, it was easy to assemble and it held all 70 plus ties I had. I like the easy directional controls with a light that shows you the ties. Overall I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Skyles

customer_reviews.title: Very simple solution !
customer_reviews.text: Ok I bought this to attempt to get my husband to organize his ties . Well, folks it worked . Easy to put together and easy to install ! Husband actually likes it ! Win win for me !
customer_reviews.author: Marlow S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizational Tool!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands owns approximately 150 ties. Before purchasing the Primode motorized tie racks, he kept his ties in a drawer, and the ties would get disorganized and wrinkled after he searched for one to wear. I purchased two tie racks for his birthday. We quickly assembled the tie racks, which take up little space in the closet. We arranged the ties in color order. He now has extra room in his nightstand, and the ties are easy to view and access and will not wrinkle. We love this product!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in the closet works great and the light is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he had his ties all over the bedroom. Fits nicely in the closet works great and the light is a really nice feature. He knows where to find do the tie he's looking for now because they are in one place and are organized by color. Holds a lot of ties! It was very easy to install. Couldn't be happier with the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Herrington

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and have like a million ties. This is great for keeping track of them and even has a light for in the morning trying to see your ties as they spin around. Easy to assemble and has plenty of room for the largest of tie collections
customer_reviews.author: Dean George

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The product so far is performing well after 2 months. The only negative that I can see is that it doesn’t have great instructions and I had to improvise to make the unit snug to the closet bar so it didn’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of ties but....
customer_reviews.text: This tie rack was not made sturdy enough to hold all the ties it allows. The more ties it has on it the slower the motor works. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Space saving rack!
customer_reviews.text: Great space saving item. I've had this unit for a few months now and am satisfied with the purchase. Allows for ease of use and organization.
customer_reviews.author: The RValls

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a jewelry organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tie rack for two months as a necklace organizer! It's a wonderful way to store all my necklaces so they don't tangle, are easily accessible and don't take up too much space. I have the heavier pieces hanging on the interior belt hooks and everything thing else; necklaces, long and short, and bracelets hanging individually on the hooks. The motor is strong enough to rotate everything. The light is very helpful. As long as I make sure the hanger next to it is far enough away to not snag the chains passing by, it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All systems GO!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely pleased with this time rack! My previous Brookstone model labored once I approached 54 tie limit and was considerably louder than the Primode. I have not had this one long so I can't speak to durability, but if it continues to work as is I am absolutely satisfied and my expectations have been exceeded. Runs quiet and smooth and I have it loaded with 72 ties and it rotates effortlessly. Had to use a little elbow grease to get battery cover off but I'm nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Installation takes a bit of figuring out, but over all nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the option to attach it to a wire closet rack. Once I figured out where I wanted it, making sure there’s enough room on left side of the unit to slide the top piece back on was the important issue. The directions are okay, you just need to work with the unit to understand it’s moving parts. Love how quiet it is and the LED lights are bright. Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a tie rack that recently stopped working. It's fine- holds a lot of ties and belts, nice light, moves fast!
customer_reviews.author: roygbiv

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasey to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie rack for my husband for Father's Day. I was tired of seeing his beautiful ties thrown on the top shelf of the closet. Sooo, I bought this after reading other reviews. I put this organizer together myself and it was up and running in about 15 minutes. It has a bolt and other gizmos to stabilize it on the closet bar. It looks sleek and works beautifully. My husband is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday last year...it works really well and he loves it! Convenient and super easy to install. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Sharper Image Tie Rack
customer_reviews.text: I've used a Sharper Image tie rack for many years. It's been useful but has worn out. I chose the Primode to replace it. It's better than the Sharper Image--no contest. It is more stable on the clothes rod. The light is brighter. I'm still adjusting to the speed of the rack--it is faster. I especially appreciate the well designed battery compartment and the ease of installing and replacing batteries. I hope I can get 20 years from this tie rack as well!
customer_reviews.author: Grant Lasson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and holds so many ties
customer_reviews.text: Works great and holds so many ties. My only thing that I wish were a tad different is that the part that attaches to the pole is a larger hole than my pole so the rack swings a bit as it turns depending on the weight of the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tie rack
customer_reviews.text: My husband has over 100 ties, he's an educator, so I purchased this tie rack for him to help him keep his ties organized. It rotates quickly & also has a light feature, so he can see ties in the dark closet.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D. Dulas

customer_reviews.title: The battery compartment is not functioning properly
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three different kinds of this tie rack and none of them worked, I installed the batteries accurately and this toy will not function. No phone number to call for technical support. Amazon could you please check for functionality before you ship items (if its electronic)? I am very frustrated with this item not working meanwhile I need the tie rack for my ties.
customer_reviews.author: felix brew

customer_reviews.title: Installed with a little ingenuity...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, durable, and worked like a dream...so much that I ordered another! Was able to customize my installation given that the diameter of my cross bar (wooden) was a little thicker than normal and could not accommodate the top cover. The bottom half fit very well, and I was able to drill two wood screws on either side of the motor directly into the wooden cross bar. Solid and stable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and would have given all five stars, however, the balancing of this machine is very difficult. I have to keep tightening it to try and keep it level. I wish there was something on the back end sticking up that was adjustable so I could level it once and be done.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: picking a tie with style
customer_reviews.text: first off the product was very light and compact,very simple to set up and once installed the product does not tilt up or down when you have more ties on one side then the other.Super impressed with power it had, it turns the ties at a good speed but not to fast. this is not my first motorized tie holder BUT IT IS MY FAVORITE NOW. I dress up six days a week for my job therefore this makes picking outfits very quick and allows me to separate ties in color.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin herrera

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots and lots of ties
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is when loaded up with ties, the motor seems to labor. But it certainly does the job. So much easier to select ties than what I was using before. And I like the light.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Rack is phenomenal, saves so much space and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The rack is super useful. I have waaaaay too many ties, and this organized them super efficiently and is super easy to use. The tie bars that come with it are kinda flimsy though. Bending them slightly makes them lose their shape, and then they're no longer functional. But, those are a bonus, not the product itself, so take that with a grain of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor
customer_reviews.text: I put my ties on it and the motor was too weak to turn when you load it all up with ties. Changed the batteries same problem.
customer_reviews.author: DJMichael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to store my ties. I have about 55 ties and now they are in one place. I really like this product and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Krnchrman

customer_reviews.title: Good automized tie organizer
customer_reviews.text: The tie organizer is good except the ties get tied up with each other. The belt hangers aren’t worth anything. You can get to them or put them away without having ties fall off .
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Are Rough, Product is Great
customer_reviews.text: The instructions do not clearly explain how to assemble and hang the unit with wired shelving. It took me a few tries to figure it out on my own. No tie owner should be without this tie rack! It allows you to store a lot of ties in a compact space, and the motorized feature is nice. I did not receive the advertised steel tie clip set.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and Fast
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with motor or tie holders. I do agree that the speed is too fast. I have to be ready to press the center button to stop it. I did not receive all parts in the package. I received two sets of "Hanging Rods Or Hooks For Wired Shelving" and did not receive the belt hooks or tightening screws.
customer_reviews.author: romeotaz

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: What a great organizer for my many ties. I hired a service to assemble the power rack. The rack is so well made and looks great. The battery power turns the ties at warp speed. Easy to stop. And the light is first class. Very happy, very satisfied. A great buy for the price. And Amazon is just so well organized, great at communication and stands for their products.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to conveniently store many ties.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install and I'm certainly not very handy. Easily stores many ties, making it very easy to see all of your ties and pick the perfect one each day! Before this I found myself basically wearing 5-10 ties all of the time and I probably have close to 65 in my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Stockman11

customer_reviews.title: Warning / Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have purchased on Amazon. The power button is broken, the battery compartment is hard to find, not labeled. When the track starts with ties it would not stop. It’s now in the trash. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: It nice.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit on our clothing bar. So it difficult to work. We are coming up with other ways to hang it
customer_reviews.author: k.broderick

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. I can't believe how many ties I have. I filled this up and have 40 more ties. May have to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Tie Rack Was A Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a Father's Day gift. It works exactly as advertised. It was easy to install and so far works like a champ. He liked it so much, I bought him another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Delivered December 19, but I didn't put up until mid-January. The third time that I used it, it no longer turns. You can hear thr motor going, but the ties don't move. Return window closed two days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like where you have to "clip" it down to keep it from lifting up.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the feature where you have to "clip" it down to keep it from lifting up.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo5

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Much better (and cheaper) than the old Brookstone ones. Much easier to change the battery - you don't have to take it off the closet rod and take all the ties off, to change the batteries. Very fast shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: traveler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband and he loves it. he has lots of neckties and this is perfect for him. install was super easy and it is an amazing product. very happy with this purchase. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leah826

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup, Easy to Use...
customer_reviews.text: This tie rack was exactly what I was looking for. Easy to assemble and easy to operate. I used to have a tie hangar, but it broke from the weight of all my ties... this baby handles it like a champ! Definitely worth the money... and don’t tell me dad or father in law, but guess what they are getting for Christmas...
customer_reviews.author: PackMan

customer_reviews.title: Biggest gripe is the speed
customer_reviews.text: It is almost too fast. It makes my ties wiz by so fast I am constantly going back
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Defective product!
customer_reviews.text: Defective! Did not work as described at all. Pressed either left or right button and it either moved late for only a split second or not at all. LED defective too. Terrible quality. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Tootle

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Nice sleek design, easy to install. Looks great and room for lots of ties. I like the light and the quiet movement. I wish there were two speeds because the track moves very quickly and I sometimes pass the tie I want and have to reverse the direction.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, has kit for wire shelving.
customer_reviews.text: For installation on wire shelving, the kit includes hangers. Others I found don’t include this, so it’s very helpful. Nevertheless, it’s not perfect and I had to improvise with some cardboard to make it stay in place. Still, I’m happy with the product. The seller provided very prompt shipping and good communication.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hackler

customer_reviews.title: Removable battery compartment
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, easy to install, great that the battery compartment separates allowing easy battery replacement. Runs a little fast when empty but slows to reasonable pace when loaded with ties. Much more sturdy than others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. Fits well in the closet which is shallow. Runs smoothly
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for the person who has a lot of ties! Easy to see in the closet and the rotation makes sure you don't miss an option. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

product_meta.title: Primode Motorized Tie Rack Closet Organizer with LED Lights, Bonus Stainless Steel Tie Clip Set, Includes J Hooks for Wired Shelving Stores Up To 72 Ties with 8 Belts, Rotation Operates With Batteries
product_meta.description:
The #1 Motorized Tie Rack for Men Of All Ages 

 This electronically rotating tie rack by Primode is the #1 choice among men everywhere because it is super neat and incredibly convenient! 

 It is designed with a multi-directional carousel that organizes, stores and displays more than 70 men's ties and/or belts. When it's time to choose a tie or belt to wear for the day, simply push the button and the carousel will slowly rotate in order to allow you to review your collection. 

 Another feature which sets our motorized tie rack apart from others is that it is extremely easy to install. Each automatic tie rack comes with a heavy duty clamp which is used to attach it to any standard-sized closet rod. Four C batteries are required to use the motorized feature. 

 This battery-operated tie rack makes a wonderful gift idea for any man in your life including your husband, dad, father-in-law, brother or uncle for special occasions such as birthdays, Father's Day and more! 

 Dimensions: 18” long, 4” high, 8” wide 

 

 * Great Gift Idea! 
 * Motorized Carousel 
 * Holds up to 72 Men's Ties or Belts 
 * Battery Operated 
 * Built-In LED Lights 
 * Easy To Install 
 * 100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED 

 Click 'Add to Cart' to order your own motorized tie rack by Primode today!
feature_bullets: This tie rack for men by Primode automatically rotates with the touch of a button. Comes With Special Screws For Hanging Rods Or Hooks For Wired Shelving, Powered by 4C batteries (not included)
It also features built-in LED lights to increase his visibility when choosing a tie or belt
Measures: 18” L x 8” W x 4.06” H, Organizes up to 72 ties and/or 8 belts.
Makes an excellent gift idea for birthdays, Father's Day, Boss' Day or any other special occasion!
We want you to be 100% satisfied with your rotating tie rack, which is why we offer a RISK-FREE MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,254 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
